title: Isometric Outlined Text Stack Effect in GIMP #Shorts

media:group.media:title: Isometric Outlined Text Stack Effect in GIMP #Shorts
media:group.media:description:
Creating a Stacked Isometric Outlined Text Effect in GIMP to the tune of some serious coffee shop vibes. In this speed art tutorial, I show you how to add text to your composition, place the text on an isometric grid, outline your text, then make your text into a cool text stack for an awesome 3D effect.
